title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
sinopsis: Elizabeth Bennet meets the wealthy and proud Mr. Darcy, and a battle of wit and social class begins. Through misunderstandings, self-discovery, and emotional growth, they overcome pride and prejudice to find love. This timeless novel explores manners, marriage, and morality in Regency England, remaining one of literatureâ€™s greatest love stories.

title: The Notebook
author: Nicholas Sparks
sinopsis: Noah Calhoun and Allie Nelson share a passionate summer romance that ends abruptly due to class differences. Years later, they reunite, reigniting a love that endures through time, hardship, and illness. A story about the power of memory and devotion, The Notebook has become a modern romantic classic.

title: Me Before You
author: Jojo Moyes
sinopsis: Louisa Clark, a cheerful but directionless woman, takes a job caring for Will Traynor, a once-active man now paralyzed after an accident. Their relationship blossoms unexpectedly, challenging both to question love, freedom, and the value of life itself. A moving and bittersweet story of transformation and impossible choices.
